question: the two lines y = x and x = - 6 intersect on the coordinate plane . what is the value of the area of the figure formed by the intersecting lines and the x - axis ?

if in a race of 70 m , a covers the distance in 20 seconds and b in 25 seconds , then a beats b by :

a certain ball team has an equal number of right - and left - handed players . on a certain day , two - thirds of the players were absent from practice . of the players at practice that day , two - third were right handed . what is the ratio of the number of right - handed players who were not at practice that day to the number of left handed players who were not at practice ?
two numbers have a h . c . f of 16 and a product of two numbers is 2560 . find the l . c . m of the two numbers ?

the number 90 can be written as the sum of the squares of 3 different positive integers . what is the sum of these 3 integers ?
a train passes a station platform in 42 sec and a man standing on the platform in 12 sec . if the speed of the train is 54 km / hr . what is the length of the platform ?

the membership of a committee consists of 3 english teachers , 4 mathematics teachers , and 2 social studies teachers . if 2 committee members are to be selected at random to write the committee ’ s report , what is the probability that the two members selected will both be social teachers ?

if x is to be chosen at random from the integers between 1 to 7 , inclusive , and y is to be chosen at random from the integers between 7 and 11 , inclusive , what is the probability that x + y will be even ?
a train 360 m long is running at a speed of 48 km / hr . in what time will it pass a bridge 140 m long ?
there are two positive numbers in the ratio 5 : 8 . if the larger number exceeds the smaller by 18 , then find the smaller number ?
population is 25000 . population increases by 10 % every year , then the population after 3 years is ?

if pintu is coded as 79523 in a certain code language , how would you code buntu in the same language ?

laura took out a charge account at the general store and agreed to pay 4 % simple annual interest . if she charges $ 35 on her account in january , how much will she owe a year later , assuming she does not make any additional charges or payments ?

seed mixture x is 40 % ryegrass and 60 % bluegrass by weight ; seed mixture y is 25 % ryegrass and 75 % fescue . if a mixture of x and y contains 34 % ryegrass , what percent of the weight of the mixture is from mixture x ?
a money lender lent rs . 1000 at 4 % per year and rs . 1400 at 5 % per year . the amount should be returned to him when the total interest comes to rs . 350 . find the number of years .
a circular logo is enlarged to fit the lid of a jar . the new diameter is 50 per cent larger than the original . by what percentage has the area of the logo increased ?

two consultants can type up a report in 12.5 hours and edit it in 7.5 hours . if mary needs 30 hours to type the report and jim needs 12 hours to edit it alone , how many t hours will it take if jim types the report and mary edits it immediately after he is done ?

express a speed of 72 kmph in meters per second ?

if a farmer wants to plough a farm field on time , he must plough 90 hectares a day . for technical reasons he ploughed only 85 hectares a day , hence he had to plough 2 more days than he planned and he still has 40 hectares left . what is the area of the farm field and how many days the farmer planned to work initially ?

jean drew a gumball at random from a jar of pink and blue gumballs . since the gumball she selected was blue and she wanted a pink one , she replaced it and drew another . the second gumball also happened to be blue and she replaced it as well . if the probability of her drawing the two blue gumballs was 16 / 49 what is the probability that the next one she draws will be pink ?
a train running at the speed of 60 km / hr crosses a pole in 7 seconds . find the length of the train .

if anangletis defined as 1 percent of 1 degree , then how many anglets are there in a sixth of a circle ?
if the difference between the length and breadth of a rectangle is 23 m and its perimeter is 226 m , what is its area ?
